frame.name: Surviving
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Survivor</fen> manages to avoid being negatively affected, despite encountering a <fen>Dangerous_situation</fen>. The negative effect is most often death, destruction, or a metaphorical construal of one of these.
<ex>Wilderness Survival: Could <fex name="sur">You</fex> <t>Survive</t> <fex name="dan">the Wild</fex>?</ex>
<ex><fex name="sur">More than 400 of the 600 residents</fex> <t>rode</t> <t>out</t> <fex name="dan">the hurricane</fex> <fex name="Place">in Gulfport's 11-story high-rise beachfront facility</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Dangerous_situation
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Dangerous_situation</fen> is one in which people are likely or expected to be negatively affected.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location where the <fen>Survivor</fen> (primarily) lives during the <fen>Dangerous_situation</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time at which the surviving takes place.
<ex><fex name="tim">Last year</fex>, Florida residents <t>survived</t> the devastating triple punch of Hurricanes Frances, Ivan and Jeanne,</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition:
<def-root>An action performed by the <fen>Survivor</fen> that enables them to live throug hthe <fen>Dangerous_situation</fen>.
<ex>They <t>survived</t> the devastation <fex name="mea">by using age-old early warning systems</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Degree</fen> to which the <fen>Survivor</fen> survives.
<ex>Growing up in a rough section of the Bronx, New York, Bobby <fex name="deg">barely</fex> <t>survived</t> several serious bouts of rheumatic fever that left him with a damaged heart.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition:
<def-root>Depictive is a description of the Survivor, during or after the Dangerous_situation.
<ex>He <t>survived</t> the crash <fex name="Depictive">with minor injuries</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: survive.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: continue to live or exist in spite of (an accident or ordeal).

lexUnit.name: survival.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the state of being alive or existing
